description: Twenty-five percent of the purchase price of this cotton-and-cashmere sweater helps benefit programs for cancer screenings, early treatment, research, and patient navigation. It's a stylish way to show your support for reducing disparities in cancer care and improving access to quality treatment for everyone at an earlier, more curable stage.
fitting_details: Regular Fit: wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 17" shoulder, a 41½" chest, and a 25½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Long sleeves with striped rib-knit cuffs.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium

Twenty-five percent of the purchase price of this item is directed to an international network of cancer charities. Within the US, proceeds benefit the Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation.
To learn more, please visit RalphLauren.com/PinkPony.
